name: Night and Day Alpha demo 1
description:
Night and Day is norse mythology based side scrolling metroidvania style game where you move back and forth areas, gaining upgrades and then being able to pass obstacles.

In this demo you can play as both playable characters. Sköll and Hati. When playing as Sköll you avoid enemies and stick away from danger any means necessary. When playing as Hati you destroy large amounts of creatures of the night. Hati is currently in development, but completely playable in this demos second level. There are enemies for you to kill even. Skölls first level is fully completed and bug tested, but those can still be found naturally.

This game is completely made by me in Unreal Engine 4, assets and code. If you encounter any problems please don't hesitate e-mailing me at Jerzku11111@gmail.com . Even if you don't encounter problems, feedback is very much welcomed. You can donate any amount to support me at paypal.me/Jerzku . Thank you!
